The Future of ORBIS – Feb. 15-16 – CESTA + Department of Classics

February 15, 2013

“The future of ORBIS”
Center for Spatial and Textual Analysis & Department of Classics
February 15-16, 2013

Friday, February 15 (Learning Theater, Wallenberg Hall, Building 160)

1            Walter Scheidel (Stanford)

2             Shawn Graham (Carleton) (*by Skype)
2.30       Break

4.15        Break
4.30       Pau de Soto (Mérida)

Saturday, February 16 (Learning Theater, Wallenberg Hall, Building 160)
